attributes.action: bad loan /loan brokers removing funds of the vunrable
attributes.additional_details:
Loan brokers and loan companys are looring the vunrable into false sense of security telling them thay can have a loan no matter the credit score/history and removing unjustifiable money before work has started and with out consent.

We would like to take this to parliment and to have tougher penaltys for injustice and to penaize the companys for miliscous intent or behavoiur to guard the vunrable humainly dignitfully
